titles.title: I will open the windows of heaven

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I'm depending on you, you're depending on me,
For in us is life eternally.
For the strongest of all is he who is weak.
I'm depending on you, you're depending on me.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Come all ye weak and weary hearted,
Listen to the Word of God.
He has promised to sustain you
Every moment by His love.
Come all ye weak and weary hearted,
Listen to the Word of God.
He has promised to sustain you by His love

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
I will open the windows of heaven
And will pour you out a blessing,
And will pour you out a blessing,
All ye servants of the Lord.
And I will open the windows of heaven
And I will pour you out a blessing (2x)
By my love.
